data.name: Felon Wars
data.detailed_description:
Team Deathmatch of 128 players split into factions
40 in Mafia, 40 in Gang, 40 in Cartel and 8 in Police.

Earn Money
  • Break into houses look for money, weapons, medications.. any tool that can assist you!
  • Buy Drug Labs and cook for the addicts. (only your faction will have access to the lab)
  • Break into vehicles.. sell or use them, note that each damage will reduce it's selling value.
  • Kill players from other factions and loot them dry

Watch out for the Cops
The police will hunt you down and will be alerted on your position if you break windows and doors!
keep low until the wanted timer runs out.

Game Rules
Each round the lowest 5 earners will be executed! (cops are excluded)
the last faction to remain will win and collect the rewards.

Look for Powerups!
Try and find powerups hidden around the map:
more inventory slots, ability to carry more items, less time wanted by the police, etc..

Play with Friends
You can invite your friends to play in team of 4 players in the same faction and communicate via in-game chat (press enter).
there is no friendly fire between teams in the same faction.. friendly faction members will be colored in white above their head.

Create your own Skins
State-of-the-art AI will create 3D avatar from a single photo.
experiment with your own unique skins!

Leaderboards
Get to the top of the leaderboards by winning games and keep the huge sum of money collected.

data.short_description: Team Deathmatch of 128 players split into Cops and Criminals. Get money anyway you can.. steal, kill, rub, sell cars/drugs. Every round the 5 worst earners will be executed! Watch out from rival felons and cops who will hunt you down!

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains player vs player combat and can show act of violence (gun shooting, fist fighting, vehicle run over)

also the game show drugs pictures and names that can offend some users.
